title: Madhya Pradesh Shocker: Healthcare Worker, Carrying COVID-19 Patient to Hospital, Stops Ambulance Midway to Drink Sugarcane Juice, Video Goes Viral
description: A healthcare worker in Madhya Pradesh, who was carrying a patient infected with coronavirus (COVID-19) in an ambulance to the hospital, stopped the vehicle midway to drink sugarcane juice.

title: Madhya Pradesh: Vaccines allotted for Sailana taken back to district headquarters, no vaccination now
description: From April 8, vaccination has been stopped in Sailana and nearby tribal areas. On April 7, 100 people were vaccinated and then it was announced that there would be no vaccination for the next 3-4 days.

title: Covid-19 second wave: 56,286 new cases in Maharashtra; bed shortage in Nagpur, Nashik, Mumbai, Pune
description: Maharashtra Covid-19 cases update: Maharashtra reported 56,286 new coronavirus cases on Thursday, which took its caseload to 32,29,547, while 376 deaths due to the infection pushed the toll to 57,028, the health department said.

title: 'He Has Covid, I Don't': Ambulance With Patient Stops At Juice Shop
description: A health worker dressed in PPE kit waits for his order of juice after stopping an ambulance carrying a Covid patient at a shop, in a shocking video that has emerged from Madhya Pradesh.

title: You may have got COVID-19, check if you had these symptoms in past
description: The researchers have introduced a new list of symptoms to the list. The usual symptoms of COVID-19 include fever, body ache, loss of smell and taste, chills, breathlessness. Several studies are suggesting that pink eyes, gastronomical conditions, and hearing impairment should not be taken lightly.

description: Indore’s MGM Medical College has been made Madhya Pradesh’s nodal centre for distribution of Remdesivir to all government healthcare facilities in th

description: Battling a terrifying spurt in Covid infections, Madhya Pradesh is going into weekend lockdown — Fridays 6pm to Mondays 6am — in all urban areas of t

title: COVID-19: In PM Modi's CMs Meet, Vaccine Shortage Takes Centre Stage
description: As some states complained of centres shutting down for lack of doses, health minister Harsh Vardhan called for an end to 'fear mongering'.

title: Curbs in Mumbai, Bengaluru, Delhi and other cities as Covid-19 crisis deepens
description: Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Karnataka, Uttar Pradesh, Delhi, Madhya Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Gujarat, Kerala and Punjab have shown a rise in the Covid-19 daily new cases

title: Coronavirus India Highlights: PM Modi asks CMs to focus on micro-containment
description: PM Modi, who chaired a meet with the state chief ministers in the wake of surge in coronavirus cases, said of late, both the people and state administration are exhibiting casual approach towards the virus.

title: Night curfew, restrictions in several states, cities to curb COVID surge in India
description: With COVID-19 infections spreading at a faster rate in the second wave, the authorities have come up with city/district-specific lockdown-like situations.

title: As Covid-19 cases rise in India, more states impose curbs
description: Through the week, weekend lockdowns have been imposed in parts of Maharashtra and Chhattisgarh, while Delhi, Punjab, major cities in Gujarat and urban areas of Rajasthan have announced night curfews.

title: Highlights: No oxygen supply crisis in Madhya Pradesh, says CM Chouhan
description: The health ministry on Wednesday said India surpassed the US to become the fastest vaccinating country in the world with an average daily rate of more than 3 million vaccine doses.

title: Assembly elections amid COVID-19: ‘Unsafe’ EVMs, Mamata Banerjee’s grit and rising violence
description: Faith in the political rulers of the day has only been sliding. We are becoming more violent. To make matter worse, we could be hit by severe physical and mental disorders due to coronavirus

title: COVID-19 in Madhya Pradesh: Schools up to class 8 will not reopen from April 15; minister hints at postponing board exams
Delhi Covid: Capital records highest 1-day spike this year with 7,000 new cases
description: With todays, 7,437 fresh Covid cases and 24 deaths, the cumulative total reached 6,98,005 and the death toll rose to 11157.For two days in the trot, the city reported over 5,000 new infections

title: From The Newsroom: Madhya Pradesh announces weekend lockdown; French Open postponed by a week
description: In your evening news brief, Madhya Pradesh has announced a weekend lockdown; Karnataka Chief Minister B S Yediyurappa will hold a meeting with the officials concerned regarding the ongoing strike of Road Transport Corporation workers; French Open has been postponed by a week and Shiv Sena MP Sanjay Raut claims "dirty politics" was being played out to destabilise the Maha Vikas Aghadi government.

title: 87-year-old man gets vaccinated in Madhya Pradesh, urges others to do so
description: Prashant Sedhia, the centre’s cold chain manager, said nurse Brijeshwari Dubey administered the dose to Khete Patel. He added Patel’s Aadhaar card declared his year of birth as 1898, which shows him to be 122

title: Covid-19: Madhya Pradesh announces weekend lockdown in urban areas
description: The Madhya Pradesh government has announced weekend lockdown in city limits across the state due to a surge in Covid-19 cases.

title: Lockdown fear: Migrants leaving Gujarat amid COVID-19 surge
description: Fearing another lockdown in the wake of a sudden spike in COVID-19 cases in Gujarat, migrant workers and their families have started leaving Surat and Ahmedabad, two of the state’s most severely affected cities

title: Madhya Pradesh imposes weekend lockdown in all urban areas as COVID-19 spreads
description: "I do not want a long lockdown, this is the last option," said Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan amid a spurt in coronavirus cases.

title: 60-hour Weekend Lockdown In All Madhya Pradesh Cities, Says CM Shivraj Singh Chouhan
description: Talking to reporters after chairing a meeting to review the COVID-19 situation in MP, Shivraj Singh Chouhan said his government aims to increase the number of beds for COVID-19 patients in the state to one lakh.

title: 60-hour weekend lockdown in all Madhya Pradesh cities
description: Chouhan said various crisis management groups will hold meetings to review the situation in cities where there has been a spurt in COVID-19 cases and will decide the course of action to contain it.

title: 26 COVID vaccination centres shut in Mumbai, waiting for more doses from Centre, says Maha health minister
description: While UP, Madhya Pradesh and Gujarat have been given far more vaccine dosages, Maharashtra has been given only 7.5 lakh dosages, the state health minister Rajesh Tope rued. Maharashtra needs at least 40 lakh COVID-19 vaccine dosages every week, he said

title: Madhya Pradesh: Collector appeals to people to quarantine self until they get their test reports
description: 'Kin, neighbours should keep tabs on their C-positive patient'

title: Coronavirus India updates: Madhya Pradesh govt announces night curfew in urban areas
description: The number of new coronavirus cases in India hit a record daily high since the outbreak of the pandemic with over 1.15 lakh new infections being reported in a span of 24 hours, pushing the nationwide Covid-19 tally to 1,28,01,785, according to the Union health ministry data updated on Wednesday.

title: Madhya Pradesh To Procure Remdesivir Injections For Poor Covid Patients

title: Madhya Pradesh to procure Remdesivir injections for poor patients, says chief minister Shivraj Singh
description: A lockdown is the last solution and before resorting to it, all other steps should be taken, he said. "I believe that people can protect themselves if they adopt COVID-appropriate behaviour...I want 'Meri Suraksha Mera Mask' to become a public movement," the CM said.

title: Indian archbishop fasts to spell out Covid-19 danger - UCA News
description: Archbishop Cornelio joins Madhya Pradesh's chief minister in an event to raise awareness as the pandemic spreads

title:
Madhya Pradesh: After Neemuch, daily corona infection rate breaches 
half-century mark in Mandsaur
description: Administration mulling over stern action after large number of Covid cases reported from rural areas.

title: MP Board Exams 2021: Madhya Pradesh board allows options for classes 9, 11 exams and 10, 12 preboards
description: According to the released statement, due to the rising covid 19 cases in Madhya Pradesh, students will get options for their examination. Students can opt for either of the two options.

title: COVID-19: Madhya Pradesh suspends bus operations with Chhattisgarh till April 15
description: On Sunday, MP Chief Minister Shivraj Singh said the state government will restrict the movement of people from Chhattisgarh to curb the spread of COVID-19.

title: Madhya Pradesh suspends bus operations with Chhattisgarh till 15 April
description: An order to this effect was issued by the Madhya Pradesh transport department

title: COVID-19: MP CM Shivraj Singh Chouhan travels Bhopal asking people to wear masks
description: Boarding the top of an open vehicle, Chouhan travelled around 50 km from Anand Nagar locality to Bairagarh on the city's outskirts, appealing to people through the public address system to wear masks.

title: 118-year-old Madhya Pradesh woman vaccinated against Covid-19 shows no side-effects: Officials
description: Tulsabai, possibly the oldest in the world to receive a Covid-19 shot, has not shown any side effects from the vaccine dosage so far, officials told news agency ANI.

title: Cops make violators watch COVID-19 awareness movie in Madhya Pradesh
description: Those who violated the lockdown were made to take an oath about following COVID-19 restrictions in Madhya Pradesh's Betul.

title: Coronavirus updates: Madhya Pradesh today reported 3,398 fresh covid cases

title: Madhya Pradesh logs 3,178 COVID-19 cases, 11 deaths in 24 hours

title: Madhya Pradesh govt to restrict movement from Chhattisgarh amid Covid-19 surge
description: Chief minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan also said that a lockdown will be imposed in isolated areas of the state whenever required.He said that the areas bordering Maharashtra have already been sealed and patience is needed to control the pandemic

title: Covid-19: Madhya Pradesh to limit movement of people from Chhattisgarh
description: Madhya Pradesh chief minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan said that to curb the spread of Covid-19, movement of people from Chhattisgarh will be restricted. Only those who need to come for "necessary and unavoidable work" will be allowed.

title: Madhya Pradesh: Barwani seals border with Maharashtra to check COVID-19 spread
description: Authorities in Barwani have decided to seal the Madhya Pradesh district’s border with neighbouring Maharashtra to check the spread of coronavirus infection, an official said on Monday

title: MP registers 2,777 new Covid cases, 16 deaths in one day

title: Madhya Pradesh contributes to country’s 81,466 new Covid cases, 469 deaths
description: The country has been recording a spike in cases for over three weeks. Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, Chhattisgarh, Karnataka, Punjab, Kerala, Tamil Nadu, Gujarat are logging steep rise in daily new cases.

title: 2 days of lockdown imposed in 3 MP districts amid Covid-19 surge
description: Earlier, the state government had imposed Sunday Lockdown in 12 districts including these four amid a spike in Covid-19 cases.

title: 3-day lockdown imposed in Madhya Pradesh's Chhindwara as Covid cases rise
description: ​A three-day lockdown has been imposed in Madhya Pradesh's Chhindwara as it reported a rise in coronavirus cases. The decision was taken by the district administration at an emergency meeting.
